name: Tibia
notes:
The Linux version of the Tibia Client is unsupported.
We will not provide any platform specific bug fixes for the Tibia Linux Client.
Tibia Linux Client is only available in a 64-bit version.
- For more info, check https://www.tibia.com/common/help.php?subtopic=linuxclientinformation
content:
files:
- installer: https://static.tibia.com/download/tibia.x64.tar.gz
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Tibia
  ld_library_path: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $installer
